description: A combined exposure effort from Jan-2016, http://www.astrobin.com/full/235582/B/ and a Jan-2017 exposure effort, Lum=134*30sek, Ha=26*5min, color=57*4min. More exposure details and pictures can be found in this Danish astro-forum: http://www.forum.2astro.dk/forum/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=8346 and here, http://www.skyandtelescope.com/online-gallery/m1-crab-nebula-jan-2016-and-jan-2017/ http://www.skyandtelescope.com/online-gallery/m1-color-picture-final-processing/ Concerning the speed of the nebula expansion please check out my pictures in this link, http://meade4m.com/index.php?/topic/4997-m1-a-9230sec-lum-picture/#entry22666 My home build observatory is placed in my front yard/in the "red light" polution zone, have a look here, Red Zone On request I will be happy to share/show tif/fit files/stack info, please just let me know, thanks. Kind regards Niels
title: M1, Jan-2016 and Jan-2017
